verses.verse: מִזְמ֥וֹר <S%H4210><s%> miz-Mor A Psalm לְדָוִ֑ד <S%H1732><s%> le-da-Vid; of David בִּ֝הְיוֹת֗וֹ <S%H1961><s%> bih-yo-To, was in בְּמִדְבַּ֥ר <S%H4057><s%> be-mid-Bar when he was in the wilderness יְהוּדָֽה׃ <S%H3063><s%> ye-hu-Dah. of Judah אֱלֹהִ֤ים׀ <S%H430><s%> E-lo-Him O God אֵלִ֥י <S%H410><s%> 'e-Li thou [art] my God אַתָּ֗ה <S%H859><s%> 'at-Tah, I אֲ‍ ֽשַׁחֲ֫רֶ֥ךָּ <S%H7836><s%> 'asha-Cha-Re-ka early will I seek צָמְאָ֬ה <S%H6770><s%> tza-me-'Ah thirsteth לְךָ֨׀ le-Cha נַפְשִׁ֗י <S%H5315><s%> naf-Shi, thee my soul כָּמַ֣הּ <S%H3642><s%> ka-Mah longeth לְךָ֣ le-Cha בְשָׂרִ֑י <S%H1320><s%> ve-sa-Ri; for thee my flesh בְּאֶֽרֶץ־ <S%H776><s%> be-'e-retz- land צִיָּ֖ה <S%H6723><s%> tzi-Yah for thee in a dry וְעָיֵ֣ף <S%H5889><s%> ve-'a-Yef and thirsty בְּלִי־ <S%H1097><s%> be-li- where no מָֽיִם׃ <S%H4325><s%> Ma-yim. water

כֵּ֭ן <S%H3651><s%> ken Thus בַּקֹּ֣דֶשׁ <S%H6944><s%> bak-Ko-desh thee in the sanctuary חֲזִיתִ֑יךָ <S%H2372><s%> cha-zi-Ti-cha; so [as] I have seen לִרְא֥וֹת <S%H7200><s%> lir-'ot To see עֻ֝זְּךָ֗ <S%H5797><s%> 'uz-ze-cha, thy power וּכְבוֹדֶֽךָ׃ <S%H3519><s%> u-che-vo-De-cha. and thy glory

כִּי־ <S%H3588><s%> ki- Because ט֣וֹב <S%H2896><s%> Tov [is] better חַ֭סְדְּךָ <S%H2617><s%> Chas-de-cha Because thy lovingkindness מֵֽחַיִּ֗ים <S%H2416><s%> me-chai-Yim, than life שְׂפָתַ֥י <S%H8193><s%> se-fa-Tai my lips יְשַׁבְּחֽוּנְךָ׃ <S%H7623><s%> ye-shab-be-Chu-ne-cha. shall praise

כֵּ֣ן <S%H3651><s%> ken So אֲבָרֶכְךָ֣ <S%H1288><s%> 'a-va-rech-Cha Thus will I bless בְחַיָּ֑י <S%H2416><s%> ve-chai-Yai; thee while I live בְּ֝שִׁמְךָ <S%H8034><s%> Be-shim-cha in thy name אֶשָּׂ֥א <S%H5375><s%> 'es-Sa I will lift up כַפָּֽי׃ <S%H3709><s%> chap-Pai. my hands

כְּמ֤וֹ <S%H3644><s%> ke-Mo with חֵ֣לֶב <S%H2459><s%> Che-lev as [with] marrow וָ֭דֶשֶׁן <S%H1880><s%> Va-de-shen and fatness תִּשְׂבַּ֣ע <S%H7646><s%> tis-Ba' shall be satisfied נַפְשִׁ֑י <S%H5315><s%> naf-Shi; My soul וְשִׂפְתֵ֥י <S%H8193><s%> ve-sif-Tei lips רְ֝נָנ֗וֹת <S%H7445><s%> re-na-Not, [thee] with joyful יְהַלֶּל־ <S%H1984><s%> ye-hal-lel- shall praise פִּֽי׃ <S%H6310><s%> Pi. and my mouth

אִם־ <S%H518><s%> 'im- When זְכַרְתִּ֥יךָ <S%H2142><s%> ze-char-Ti-cha When I remember עַל־ <S%H5921><s%> 'al- on יְצוּעָ֑י <S%H3326><s%> ye-tzu-'Ai; thee upon my bed בְּ֝אַשְׁמֻר֗וֹת <S%H821><s%> be-'ash-mu-Rot, on thee in the [night] watches אֶהְגֶּה־ <S%H1897><s%> 'eh-geh- [and] meditate בָּֽךְ׃ Bach.

כִּֽי־ <S%H3588><s%> ki- for הָיִ֣יתָ <S%H1961><s%> ha-Yi-ta have been עֶזְרָ֣תָה <S%H5833><s%> 'ez-Ra-tah Because thou hast been my help לִּ֑י Li; וּבְצֵ֖ל <S%H6738><s%> u-ve-Tzel therefore in the shadow כְּנָפֶ֣יךָ <S%H3671><s%> ke-na-Fei-cha of thy wings אֲרַנֵּֽן׃ <S%H7442><s%> 'a-ran-Nen. will I rejoice

דָּבְקָ֣ה <S%H1692><s%> da-ve-Kah followeth hard נַפְשִׁ֣י <S%H5315><s%> naf-Shi My soul אַחֲרֶ֑יךָ <S%H310><s%> 'a-cha-Rei-cha; after בִּ֝֗י Bi, תָּמְכָ֥ה <S%H8551><s%> ta-me-Chah upholdeth יְמִינֶֽךָ׃ <S%H3225><s%> ye-mi-Ne-cha. thee thy right hand

וְהֵ֗מָּה <S%H1992><s%> ve-Hem-mah, those לְ֭שׁוֹאָה <S%H7722><s%> Le-sho-'ah to destroy יְבַקְשׁ֣וּ <S%H1245><s%> ye-vak-Shu But those [that] seek נַפְשִׁ֑י <S%H5315><s%> naf-Shi; my soul יָ֝בֹ֗אוּ <S%H935><s%> ya-Vo-'u, [it] shall go בְּֽתַחְתִּיּ֥וֹת <S%H8482><s%> be-tach-ti-Yot into the lower parts הָאָֽרֶץ׃ <S%H776><s%> ha-'A-retz. of the earth

יַגִּירֻ֥הוּ <S%H5064><s%> yag-gi-Ru-hu They shall fall עַל־ <S%H5921><s%> 'al- unto יְדֵי־ <S%H3027><s%> ye-dei- the power חָ֑רֶב <S%H2719><s%> Cha-rev; of the sword מְנָ֖ת <S%H4521><s%> me-Nat they shall be a portion שֻׁעָלִ֣ים <S%H7776><s%> shu-'a-Lim for foxes יִהְיֽוּ׃ <S%H1961><s%> yih-Yu. become

וְהַמֶּלֶךְ֮ <S%H4428><s%> ve-ham-me-leCh But the king יִשְׂמַ֪ח <S%H8055><s%> yis-Mach shall rejoice בֵּאלֹ֫הִ֥ים <S%H430><s%> be-Lo-Him in God יִ֭תְהַלֵּל <S%H1984><s%> Yit-hal-lel by him shall glory כָּל־ <S%H3605><s%> kol- Everyone הַנִּשְׁבָּ֣ע <S%H7650><s%> han-nish-Ba' every one that sweareth בּ֑וֹ bo; כִּ֥י <S%H3588><s%> ki for יִ֝סָּכֵ֗ר <S%H5534><s%> yis-sa-Cher, shall be stopped פִּ֣י <S%H6310><s%> pi but the mouth דֽוֹבְרֵי־ <S%H1696><s%> dov-rei- of them that speak שָֽׁקֶר׃ <S%H8267><s%> Sha-ker. lies
